QuestData.Title: Draconic Defensive
QuestData.Description:
I've heard words on the wind of outsiders allying with Clan Nokhud in an effort to defeat our dragon neighbors. These Primalists are a blight on the plains of our ancestors.
Slay them, and bring me the cores of the elementals they command.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay primalists in the Storm Scar.
